resources.string: First, hide the proximity sensor of your phone then click on the validation button below.
Then, remove your finger from the proximity sensor of your phone and click again on the validation button below.

Here are the results of your calibration process. If unsure of any of those figures, please go back in the process to perform again calibration. If measurement are OK to you, please click on Calibrate to calibrate you sensor.
Are you sure you want to proceed ?
You are about to update your proximity sensor configuration. Please confirm you want to proceed with this change. Your phone will then automatically reboot to take those changes into consideration.
